participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: adventurous and open-minded, always eager to explore new relationships and experiences.
participant_1.background: i'm in an open polyamorous relationship. i also have a dog walking business. i have three dogs. my father was a door to door salesman. i like to watch the olympics.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: responsible and loyal, with a strong sense of duty and a love for animals.
participant_2.background: i'm employed by the us postal service. i've a german shepherd named barnaby. my favorite color is grey. i'm terrified of scorpions. my father drove a car for nascar.
